ButtonNode.name: Button
ButtonNode.description: A button that triggers an action

properties.name: label
properties.description: Button label text

SliderNode.name: Slider
SliderNode.description: A slider control for adjusting values

properties.name: value
properties.description: Current value of the slider

properties.name: min
properties.description: Minimum value

properties.name: max
properties.description: Maximum value

properties.name: step
properties.description: Step size

properties.name: label
properties.description: Label text displayed above the slider

GreaterThanNode.name: Greater Than
GreaterThanNode.description: Outputs 1 if first input is greater than second input, 0 otherwise. Logic conditional node. Can also gate audio signals.

inputs.name: audioIn
inputs.description: Audio signal to gate based on condition

outputs.name: audioOut
outputs.description: Gated audio output (passes when condition is true)

EqualsNode.name: Equals
EqualsNode.description: Outputs 1 if inputs are equal, 0 otherwise. Comparison conditional node. Can also gate audio signals.

inputs.name: audioIn
inputs.description: Audio signal to gate based on condition

outputs.name: audioOut
outputs.description: Gated audio output (passes when condition is true)

SelectNode.name: Select
SelectNode.description: Routes input to one of multiple outputs based on selector value. Similar to Max/MSP select object.

MidiInputNode.name: MIDI Input
MidiInputNode.description: Receives MIDI messages from connected MIDI devices. Outputs note, velocity, and control change data.

MidiToFreqNode.name: MIDI to Frequency
MidiToFreqNode.description: Converts MIDI note numbers (0-127) to frequency values in Hz. MIDI note 60 is middle C (261.63 Hz). Each octave doubles the frequency.

inputs.name: midiNote
inputs.description: MIDI note number (0-127). Connect a MIDI Input, Scale to MIDI, or Slider node.

outputs.name: frequency
outputs.description: Frequency in Hz corresponding to the MIDI note

properties.name: midiNote
properties.description: Input MIDI note number. 60 = Middle C (C4), 69 = A4 (440 Hz reference).

properties.name: frequency
properties.description: Computed output: Frequency in Hz. Connect this to an Oscillator's frequency input.

inputs.name: trigger
inputs.description: Triggers playback of the loaded audio file

outputs.name: output
outputs.description: Audio output from the loaded file

properties.name: fileName
properties.description: Name of the loaded audio file

properties.name: duration
properties.description: Duration of the loaded audio file in seconds

properties.name: label
properties.description: Label text displayed on the node

DisplayNode.name: Display
DisplayNode.description: Displays numeric values from control signals. Useful for debugging and monitoring values in your audio graph.

inputs.name: input
inputs.description: Value to display. Connect any control signal here.

properties.name: value
properties.description: Current displayed value (updates from input)

properties.name: precision
properties.description: Decimal places to display. 0 = integers only, 2 = two decimals.

properties.name: label
properties.description: Label text shown above the value.

RandomNode.name: Random
RandomNode.description: Generates random values between min and max at a specified rate. Useful for adding variation to parameters.

inputs.name: rate
inputs.description: Rate of random value generation in Hz

outputs.name: value
outputs.description: Random value between min and max

properties.name: rate
properties.description: How many times per second to generate a new random value. 1 = once per second.

properties.name: min
properties.description: Minimum random value (inclusive).

properties.name: max
properties.description: Maximum random value (inclusive).

properties.name: currentValue
properties.description: Current random value (updates automatically).

properties.name: label
properties.description: Label text displayed on the node

TimerNode.name: Timer
TimerNode.description: Triggers events at specified intervals. Use for rhythmic patterns, sequencing, or periodic automation.

inputs.name: trigger
inputs.description: Starts the timer when startMode is 'manual'. Connect a Button here.

inputs.name: reset
inputs.description: Stops the timer and resets the count to 0.

outputs.name: trigger
outputs.description: Outputs a pulse each time the timer fires. Connect to trigger other nodes.

outputs.name: count
outputs.description: Number of times fired. Useful for sequencing.

properties.name: mode
properties.description: oneshot = fires once then stops. loop = fires repeatedly.

properties.name: delay
properties.description: Initial delay before first trigger in milliseconds. 1000 = 1 second.

properties.name: interval
properties.description: Time between triggers in loop mode (ms). 1000 = 1 beat per second (60 BPM).

properties.name: startMode
properties.description: auto = starts immediately. manual = waits for trigger input.

properties.name: enabled
properties.description: Enable/disable the timer.

properties.name: count
properties.description: Current trigger count (read-only).

properties.name: label
properties.description: Label text displayed on the node

ScaleToMidiNode.name: Scale to MIDI
ScaleToMidiNode.description: Converts scale degrees to MIDI notes and frequencies based on key and mode. Use for melodic sequencing with musical scales.

inputs.name: scaleDegree
inputs.description: Scale degree to convert. Connect a Slider, Random, or sequencer output.

outputs.name: frequency
outputs.description: Frequency in Hz corresponding to the MIDI note

properties.name: scaleDegree
properties.description: Scale degree to convert. 0 = root note, positive = higher notes, negative = lower notes. Goes across octaves.

properties.name: key
properties.description: Root key of the scale. This is the note at degree 0.

properties.name: mode
properties.description: Scale mode/type. Major and minor are most common. Pentatonic scales have 5 notes per octave.

properties.name: midiNote
properties.description: Computed output: MIDI note number (60 = middle C).

properties.name: frequency
properties.description: Computed output: Frequency in Hz. Connect to an Oscillator's frequency.
